Retrieve cumulative prevalence of a lineage

Source: R/getCumulativeBySubadmin.R
getCumulativeBySubadmin.Rd

Retrieve cumulative prevalence of a PANGO lineage by the immediate administrative level of a location

getCumulativeBySubadmin(
  pangolin_lineage,
  location = NULL,
  mutations = NULL,
  ndays = NULL
)

Arguments

pangolin_lineage:

PANGO lineage name
location:

(optional) a location name (if not specified, cumulative prevalence at the country level globally returned)
mutations:

(optional) a `vector` of mutation(s)
ndays:

(optional) an `integer` specifying number of days from current date to calculative cumuative counts (if not specified, no limit on window)

Value

dataframe

Examples

# Worldwide prevalence of B.1.1.7 by country
getCumulativeBySubadmin(pangolin_lineage="B.1.1.7") %>% head()

#> Retrieving data... 
#>           date             name   id total_count lineage_count cum_total_count
#> 47  2020-03-24             Cuba None           1             0               2
#> 158 2020-04-07     Saint Martin  MAF           1             0              10
#> 166 2020-09-08   Sint Eustatius  BES           3             0               4
#> 42  2021-01-10          Comoros  COM           3             0               6
#> 21  2021-01-12          Bermuda  BMU           1             0              40
#> 69  2021-01-14 French Polynesia  PYF           1             0              11
#>     cum_lineage_count proportion proportion_ci_lower proportion_ci_upper
#> 47                  0       0.00        2.169085e-04           0.6668218
#> 158                 0       0.00        4.789043e-05           0.2171963
#> 166                 0       0.00        1.153328e-04           0.4447626
#> 42                  0       0.00        7.849985e-05           0.3303889
#> 21                  2       0.05        1.053449e-02           0.1508651
#> 69                  0       0.00        4.363580e-05           0.1999946
#>     lineage
#> 47  B.1.1.7
#> 158 B.1.1.7
#> 166 B.1.1.7
#> 42  B.1.1.7
#> 21  B.1.1.7
#> 69  B.1.1.7

# County-level prevalence of B.1.1.7
getCumulativeBySubadmin(pangolin_lineage="B.1.1.7", location="California") %>% head()

#> Retrieving data... 
#>           date                               name              id total_count
#> 63  2020-10-29 Napa, Solano, Yolo, Marin Counties  USA_US-CA_None           6
#> 26  2020-12-09                             Fresno USA_US-CA_06019           1
#> 7   2020-12-15                   Brentwood County USA_US-CA_06013           1
#> 72  2020-12-23                            Redding  USA_US-CA_None           2
#> 4   2020-12-25              Alexandria, VA County  USA_US-CA_None           1
#> 119 2020-12-27                             Sutter USA_US-CA_06101           1
#>     lineage_count cum_total_count cum_lineage_count proportion

#> 26              0               1                 0          0
#> 7               0               1                 0          0
#> 72              0               2                 0          0
#> 4               0               1                 0          0
#> 119             0               1                 0          0
